## Trigger.id property

Unique name of the trigger as identified in `ui_actions` plugin trigger registry, such as "SELECT\_RANGE\_TRIGGER" or "VALUE\_CLICK\_TRIGGER".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
id: ID;
```
